meta.title: Introduction to Financial Accounting
meta.description: Discover the fundamentals of financial accounting from the ground up. This course will teach you to prepare and analyze financial statements. You will also learn to use your understanding of accounting to drive insights into business performance.

default.name: Comprehensive Problem

items.name: Post the June journal entries to the ledgers
Prepare the June income statement, retained earnings statement, and balance sheet
Journalize and post the closing entries for June
Prepare the June post-closing trial balance
Post the July journal entries to the ledgers
Prepare the July income statement, retained earnings statement, and balance sheet
Journalize and post the closing entries for July
Prepare the July post-closing trial balance
